name: Gas Infrastructure Europe
membership: GIE is a founding member of GasNaturally (www.gasnaturally.eu)
memberOrga: See the list of GIE members at : http://www.gie.eu/index.php/about-us/gie-members/gie-members
goal:
Gas Infrastructure Europe (GIE) is an association representing the sole interest of the infrastructure industry in the natural gas business such as Transmission System Operators, Storage System Operators and LNG Terminal Operators.

GIE has currently 70 members in 25 European countries. One of the objectives of GIE is to voice the views of its members vis-à-vis the European Commission, the regulators and other stakeholders. Its mission is to actively contribute to the construction of a single, sustainable and competitive gas market in Europe underpinned by a stable and predictable regulatory framework as well as by a sound investment climate.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Single market, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
• Energy Union
• Energy and Climate policy
• Security of Gas Supply; European Energy Supply Strategy
• Internal Gas Market and Network Codes
• Gas Target Model; Bridge to 2025
• LNG access conditions and transparency
• Gas storage access conditions and transparency
• Energy Efficiency
• Renewable Energy Sources
• Electricity market design
